identificationModule.briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of SHR-1918 in Patients With Hyperlipidemia
identificationModule.officialTitle: Evaluation of the Efficacy and Safety of Multiple Subcutaneous Injections of SHR-1918 in Patients With Hyperlipidemia in Poor Control: a Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Phase II Clinical Trials

descriptionModule.briefSummary: Evaluation of the efficacy and safety of multiple subcutaneous injections of SHR-1918 in patients with hyperlipidemia in poor control: a multicenter, randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled phase II clinical trials

primaryOutcomes.measure: Percent change in calculated LDL-C from baseline to week 24

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Percent change in calculated TG from baseline to week 24
